name: Krakatoa
description:
Super-simple perceptually uniform 10-step color palette generator using HSLUV.


How to Use:

  1. Select an element with the desired fill color
  2. Open Krakatoa (Plugins > Krakatoa)
  3. Rename your color in the Krakatoa UI
  4. Click generate palette


Coming Soon:

  • Generate styles
  • Optional dark mode palette
  • Change contrast stepper values
  • Custom amount of colors
